name: Shopping Kart Racer
description:
Movement is via a "left" and "right" - Eg push both forwards to go forwards, both left will make you run left around the kart, one forward and one backward will rotate the kart etc.

Controller:

    Left - Left stick
   Right - Right stick
   Sprint - RT
   Rest - RB
  Jump - Button south (A, cross, etc)

Keyboard:

    Left - WASD
   Right - Arrow keys
   Sprint - Shift
   Rest - Control
  Jump - Space
